rules_text: When Dust Devil Lieutenant enters, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is 2 plus the greatest power among Galaxians you control.
flavor_text: [i]The Zarax were regarded as a threat until Boone realized they were simply lost and scared. A note of sympathy and a helping hand was enough to earn the Dust Devils a potent new ally.[/i]
